#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	char foo[200], S[100005];
	char temp;
	int i, T;

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{
		memset(foo, '0', sizeof(foo));
		i = 0;
		temp = 'a';

		scanf("%s", S);

		while (S[i])
		{
			if (foo[S[i]] == '0')
			{
				printf("%c", temp);
				foo[S[i]] = temp;
				temp++;
			}
			else
			{
				printf("%c", foo[S[i]]);
			}
			i++;
		}

		printf("\n");
	}

	return 0;
}
